posts.body:
>>86c6a8e9-6098-4dc8-bf0b-450eca329b53
Anyone can turn on the option for ZeroNet to use TOR right now:
Go to the main ZeroNet page, open up the menu with the three vertical dots, click on configuration, scroll down to TOR and set to Always.
  
I dunno why this shit isn't enabled by default.

>>84e7896c-a491-4b03-bcc5-37d88df24e3f
Hotwheels got tired of being threatened/harassed for creating 8ch by randoms and journos, also holds a grudge against Jim for some things that happened behind the scenes. Josh doesn't seem to know what happened between hotwheels and Jim after he quit.
Plus he is a born again christcuck who constantly moralfags about everything.

Put that all together and he now wants 8ch dead and buried, he now literally believes creating 8ch was the worst mistake of his life and is trying to "fix it."

ATOM RPG.
Had a rough start at first, its been a decade I played old school Fallout but now I'm killing and looting almost everyone I come across.

Took a break from dorf fort masterwork, encountering a bug where the dorfs don't eat ANY butchered meat and no clue why started happening all of a sudden.

>>2a09856f-c62b-469f-b848-cb2f85f310e6
>So does the way it work that we're seeding the files?
Yes.
Pinning the board helps distribute files and posts to everyone browsing, /v/ would load way faster if everyone here pinned it.
As of right now, newer posts and files take awhile to download and its annoying.

>Could we accidentally seed child pornography and get tracked for that?
You should set TOR in the ZeroNet configuration to "Always" or use a VPN to make sure you don't get tracked.

And in the worst case scenario, like this place gets blasted by a massive CP bot attack, you can use your favorite program to secure delete the entire ZeroNet folder.

>>de521800-b9e3-4718-bbf1-d2ab9bd986dc
Go to the board list and click [Pin] next to the board's ID on the list.
Once its pinned you will help distribute all the board's posts and images, except for the certs you blacklisted and the voluntary shared blacklist set by the board owner if you have that enabled.

The board is kind of like a giant torrent and too many faggots are leeching.

>>09c8d8ac-0445-45da-848c-a705c6e24ed8
ZeroNet and L2P are too new for any kind of large scale deployment, shit needs to develop further.
For slightly better security and preventing CP spam, would prefer something more like an old school Nip textboard. Would also help loading from fewer anons with ZeroNet active.

Was also wondering about the millchan engine, do the posts or breads ever expire? Because this shit will get fucking massive after a month of use.

>>8cb8e611-0e99-4809-a321-b3a5b0a6f3ee
Some of that might be from TOR exit nodes, who knows for sure.

>>7d3aa578-abbf-4926-a217-7d1411eebaa4
I dunno if its ZeroNet or the millchan engine but seems like autoupdate is always on for every page, so you should probably keep your open tabs limited.

==The bunker was talked about on BigBlackCock==
>8chan: Where are users going now?

>There are also projects such as ZeroNet, which is designed to decentralise web hosting.
>Instead of storing information on a web server, ZeroNet shares data among thousands of users - similar to the way films are shared via torrents.
>A copycat version of 8chan has already appeared on ZeroNet. And in theory any messages posted cannot be removed by administrators or law enforcement, because the content is shared across so many different devices.
http://archive.fo/OpTVw

>>d6297d32-6b51-45cb-a6e6-74a849d92bc6
>>91d5d9c1-c6d8-4ad7-90ae-2b65c14d6bfd
Go to your main ZeroNet page, open the dropdown menu with the three dots, click configuration, scroll down to TOR and select "Always"

If you're on windows, you can right click the ZeroNet tray icon and see what IP address you're using, once you set the TOR setting to Always, it should obviously be different from your actual IP.

If it is still your actual IP, something is wrong on your end.

>>53b2b561-0c69-4396-909b-cf12efab6119
I think the debug.log in the ZeroNet folder has all the IPs of peers and what you downloaded from them too.

>>6db9c6a4-b146-4c76-a53b-ab66525c8ae7
Its probably hidden or temporarily quarantined because of all the autistic screeching.

>>6b2595c4-3506-4398-bf2f-0bff01d0ab1c
Oh I thought he was talking about 8ch

>>038e042b-d372-4792-84f3-9b5210b13bd0
How slow is the loading from the onion site?

I checked 5ch, they still have their domains and Cloudflare so the Nips are okay.
Would actually feel bad if they got fucked over because of us.

I bet hotwheels doesn't gives a shit if his autistic crusade against 8ch kills the world's oldest active textboard along with it.
And when I say active, at least the one fourth of all Nips use 5ch semi-frequently.

Looks like /pol/ on here is starting to get spammed by outside retards.
I'm probably going to mute it before the CP starts.
We got a whole board faget

>House Homeland Security Committee wants Jim to testify to congress.
Holy shit. They could probably force him too, he is still an American citizen and living in a friendly country that honors extradition requests.

>>c3fce0b8-dddc-4b4a-a117-4d93ed11ce1b
Mark didn't start this site anon, it was someone from the GG thread.

>>5c9bd3d5-99f0-46ee-a186-b15bfa947e3d
Dog eating chinks can successfully run a P2P darknet off of knockoff phones and potato computers while evading a government that regularly kills/gulags dissidents without trial for even minor shit.
Us evading Silicon Valley censorship is fucking easy compared to that.
